IX.ii.1.A.1.c
.
A&A Qualification: Veterans Entitled to Pension
There is no statutory or regulatory requirement for a Veteran pensioner to be rated 100-percent disabled to be determined to be in need of regular A&A.
Therefore, if a Veteran pensioner meets the criteria for A&A under
38 CFR 3.352(a)
, the rating activity may grant SMP at the A&A rate even though the Veteran is not rated 100-percent disabled under the rating schedule.
Reference
:  For more information on the statutory requirements for SMP at the A&A rate vs. the housebound rate for pension, see
38 U.S.C. 1521(d)
, and
38 U.S.C. 1521(e)
.
